Name: Blue Boy: Bleeding Out
About the game: Blue Boy: Bleeding Out is a short but challenging platformer where you bleed as you run. You must avoid touching your bloody path on the way to the exit. Based on the original browser game, this revamped version contains quality of life updates and new content not seen in the original, such as completely new and original pixel art, music, and sound effects, a speedrun mode, achievements, extra collectables, and a new set of levels! FEATURES 30 Levels! Level Par Times! Speedrun Mode! Over 75 Collectables! Steam Achievements! Art by Luis Casta√±on Audio by Loki Miah Rodriguez
